title: Add Google Site Verification Meta Tag

requirements.summary: Add Google site verification meta tag to frontend/index.html head section
acceptanceCriteria: The Google site verification meta tag is present in frontend/index.html
The meta tag is placed within the <head> section
The meta tag appears before the opening <body> tag
The verification content value matches exactly: BDqzMIYR_Iw59Cw7LJqSVoMEfTtuBlNF0hxcBC7095w

file_operations.description: Add the Google site verification meta tag '<meta name="google-site-verification" content="BDqzMIYR_Iw59Cw7LJqSVoMEfTtuBlNF0hxcBC7095w" />' within the <head> section, positioned before the opening <body> tag. Insert it after the existing meta tags but before any <script> tags or the closing </head> tag. Preserve all existing SEO meta tags, Open Graph tags, and other head content without modification.
